Smart technologies for better real estate investment decisions

We combine the latest technology with our own experience to find and select the most profitable projects for your profitable investment

MsTokenization-module for converting real estate objects into digital assets

The digital stake in the FlipHouse ecosystem is a digital cryptographic asset tied to a real estate object. The number of digital shares issued is determined by dividing the value of the property by the face value of one digital share (1,000 rubles or $ 10). By becoming the owner of digital shares, the investor receives a legal right to a part of the profit generated by the object, and the platform algorithm ensures an error-free and autonomous distribution of dividends in accordance with the register of holders

Learn more

MsPredict-algorithm for determining the fair value and rental rate for profitable real estate

By processing thousands of market offers for the sale and lease of commercial real estate, our algorithms use geoanalysis of the environment to assess factors that directly affect the profitability of potential tenants. This allows you to determine the additional potential for the value of the object or to identify its current revaluation

Learn more

MsAnalytic- algorithm for analyzing the most effective use of a commercial property

Based on the study of the infrastructure of the analyzed location and its competitive environment, the system identifies business options demanded by the market, compatible with the parameters of the assessed object and the requirements of potential tenants, for each use case

Learn more
